sentences.sContent: You have probably heard of this tactic before.
sentences.sContent_eng: You have probably heard of this tactic before.
sentences.sCn: 你以前也可能听说过这个策略。

sentences.sContent: Over the next few months, however, that tactic will be difficult to sustain.
sentences.sContent_eng: Over the next few months, however, that tactic will be difficult to sustain.
sentences.sCn: 然而在接下去的几个月这个策略将很难维持下去。

remMethod.val: tact(接触) + ic → 通过手段来接触 → 手段

words.tran: 战术的；策略的；善于策略的
